What preparation is needed for this Chec: Fasting is required for about 10 - 12 hours before the sample collection. Consumption of water is permitted.
Who should book this checkup?: Kidney and urinary system diseases are common in Indian population with about 7% of Indians experiencing chronic kidney disorders. Lifestyle disorders such as diabetes and hypertension are strongly associated with a kidney disorder. This diagnostic health checkup helps in early diagnosis of kidney and urinary problems, including urinary tract infections, impaired kidney function, and some medical conditions that lead to the abnormal presence of blood cells, sugars and ketone bodies in the urine.Includes 35 TestAdvanced Renal Profile6 testsUrea Nitrogen BloodCalcium Ion Specific Electrode Potentiometric Method BloodChloride BloodCreatinine Conventional BloodSodium BloodBun / Serum Creatinine Ratio Calculated Blood SerumHemogram - 6 Part (Diff)28 testsAbsolute Basophil Count Automated BloodAbsolute Eosinophil Count Automated BloodAbsolute Monocyte Count Automated BloodAbsolute Neutrophil Count Automated BloodMean Corpuscular Volume Automated BloodHaemoglobin Automated BloodMean Corpuscular Haemoglobin Concentration BloodMean Corpuscular Haemoglobin Automated BloodAbsolute Lymphocyte Count Automated BloodHematocrit Automated BloodMean Platelet Volume Automated BloodPlatelet Count Microscopy BloodRed Blood Cells Count Automated BloodTotal Leucocytes Count Automated BloodNeutrophils % Automated BloodLymphocyte % Automated BloodMonocyte % Automated BloodEosinophils % Automated BloodBasophils % Automated BloodImmature Granulocytes (Ig %) Automated Blood(Ig) Immature Granulocytes Automated BloodNucleated Red Bloods Automated BloodNucleated Red Blood Cells % AutomatedPlateletcrit(Pct) AutomatedPlatelet Distribution Width (Pdw) Automated BloodPlatelet To Large Cell Ratio (Plcr) Automated BloodRed Cell Distribution Width (Rdw-Cv) Automated BloodRed Cell Distribution Width - Sd(Rdw-Sd) Automated BloodUrine Analysis Routine Macroscopy Random UrineHow it works?Pick a package that suits your healthcare needs and seamlessly book a home sample collection|We will send a certified professional to your place to assist you with the sample collection|After your sample collection, you can access your reports within your account on our mobile application.
